function.description:
Connect to a Mssql database. Returns a connection object.
| Parameter | Description | | ---------- | ----------- | | `database` | The database parameter wants the name of the database you want to connect to. | | `host` | The host parameter wants the name of the host. | | `port` | The default port is 3306 but can be set to a different port is necessary. | | `user` | The user parameter is for the username. This is optional. | `pass` | The pass parameter is for the password. This is optional. | `options` | The options parameter is optional. It is used for setting mssql specific options. |
More information on the options parameter can be found on [http://jtds.sourceforge.net/faq.html#urlFormat](http://jtds.sourceforge.net/faq.html#urlFormat)

example.header: Connect to the MsSQL database "testdb" with user "user" and password "pass".
